sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sign-up', templateUrl: './sign-up.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sign-up.component.css'] }) export class SignUpComponent implements OnInit { type: string = "password" isText: boolean = false; eyeIcon: string ="fa-eye-slash" constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } hideShowPass(){ this.isText = !this.isText; this.isText ? this.eyeIcon = "fa-eye" : this.eyeIcon = "fa-eye-slash"; this.isText ? this.type = "text" : this.type = "password"; } }
